description: This Java source file defines the OpenApiConfig class, which configures the OpenAPI (Swagger) documentation for the Notes Backend API. It primarily contains annotations to specify API metadata such as title, version, description, contact info, license, and server details, enabling proper generation of API docs.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: A configuration class annotated with @Configuration and @OpenAPIDefinition, providing metadata for Swagger/OpenAPI documentation.
